name: Demented Dreams [Part 1]
description:
NOTE: THIS IS COMPLETED. I NO LONGER HAVE THE FILES. I CAN'T EDIT THIS ANYMORE.

Additional Note: I have stopped responding to comments due to various health problems and real life issues that prevented me from being able to continue developing for some time. I apologize for this inaction. The game will always be free, but will not receive any updates, DLC or remastering. 

You are Janie Geraldine, a young woman who suffers from a mental condition called schizophrenia. Knowing you have nowhere else to go after being released, you decide to visit the home of your doctor. Little do you realize what will be waiting for you there...

http://www.imxprs.com/free/dementedgamesent/dementeddreams
